description: Erection of a single storey rear and infill extension and change from window to door with juliette balcony at first floor level. Excavation of basement including the installation of front lightwell and change to bay window on front elevation. Replacement of window on side elevation.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2ca84e11-7fff-5096-2823-e633b6818e1f"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;background-color:#ffffff;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:10pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed ground floor extension and first floor juliette balcony by reason of its scale, bulk and detailed design would result in an obtrusive and incompatible form of development which would fail to respect the character and appearance of the subject property and terrace of which it forms part. As such the proposed development is contrary to policies D3 (Optimising site capacity through the design-led approach) and D6 (Housing quality and standards) of the London Plan 2021, policy LP1 (</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Design Quality and Local Character) of the Local Plan 2033</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"> and the guidance contained within Hackney Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-beeb6b25-7fff-19c1-07e5-734613621f0c"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed development, by reason of its size, design and position, would result in loss of light and outlook, give rise to overbearing impact, increased sense of enclosure, and increased overlooking which would result in an unacceptable adverse impact on the amenity of the neighbouring occupiers. As such the proposed development is contrary to policies D3 (Optimising site capacity through the design-led approach) and D6 (Housing quality and standards) of the London Plan 2021, policy LP2 (Development and Amenity</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">) of the Local Plan 2033</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> and the guidance contained within Hackney Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009.</span></span><br></p>
